Text: FW UtiliCorp Gas HedgeDarron Will you please give this guy a call today Let me know if you need any help Regards Lucy Original Message From Browning John ENRON Sent Tuesday October AM To Ortiz Lucy Subject UtiliCorp Gas Hedge Here are the volumes to hedge as requested in our phone conversation yesterday These volumes are for and are shown as the number of contracts to swap I assume we will be talking later today Thanks Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec John Browning Wholesale Operations Telephone FAX Mobil Pager Visit our Web site at wwwtheenergyteamcom
Quote pleaseJohn When you get a moment Offer for CAL volumes are in the attached spreadsheet strike And if they wanted to spend where would the strike be Many thanks L NG Exposurexls
KaZaAwwwkazaacom Lucy Ortiz Energy Risk Management Enron Americas P F M

ANSIXQFWGarantFaPlease look this over and let me know what you think Many thanks Lucy Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESmnavarrogasEpemexEcom NRONcom Sent Friday July PM To Ortiz Lucy Subject Garanta Lucy Te mando el formato de la garanta que va a otorgar PEMEX a PMI Te llamo despus de la comida Saludos Martha Navarro Garanta estndardoc WINMAILDAT

Thank you so muchKen I cant begin to tell you how much I admire you I still trust you I still believe in you I still think you are making the right decisions for the future of this company Do you know why Because I absolutely love the Enron that you built Enron believed in me Enron took a chance on me Enron made me into what I am today Im a single mom that started in the back office worked her way up onto the Weather Derivatives Desk and finally onto the Natural Gas Trading Floor in Energy Risk Management Where else could anyone get these sort of opportunities NOWHERE Im so proud of this company I know that it will rise from the ashes and be reborn into something new Warmest regards Lucy Ortiz Senior Analyst NYMEX Middle Marketing Enron North America P H PS Id work for you anytime anywhere

RE AECO Pricing Cc The CAD is a customer request Thanks so much L Original Message From Mckay Jonathan Sent Thursday August PM To Ortiz Lucy Cc Cooke Ian Subject RE AECO Pricing Lucy Almost all basis in Canada is quoted in USD normal convention is to quote the fixed price in CAD I will get Ian Cooke to send you the historical basis for AECO in USD If you want a currency curve to work the numbers back into Canadian dollars we can also get you that but Im not sure what that would tell you Please let me know if you need anything else Jon Ian could you please forward our historical AECO curve to Lucy Thanks Original Message From Ortiz Lucy Sent Thursday August AM To Mckay Jonathan Subject AECO Pricing John Hello again Is there anyone up there that can email me historical AECO basis in CAD and USD for the last years Many thanks and kind regards Lucy
AECO PricingJohn Hello again Is there anyone up there that can email me historical AECO basis in CAD and USD for the last years Many thanks and kind regards Lucy

FW Wasatch QuoteI need to refresh this quote John this time can I just have the Sumas piece instead of the all in price Volumes are on the attachment John Sumas Offer please DecMar and then MayNov Dutch Nymex piece I attached the numbers this time Again Im looking for your offer for a fixed price Northwest Pipeline sumas index swap Thanks Enron sheetxls

Wasatch QuoteOffer please DecMar and then MayNov Original Message From Brent Turner ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESBrentTurnerCbrentwasatchenergyEcomE NRONcom Sent Wednesday August PM To Ortiz Lucy Subject I attached the numbers this time Again Im looking for your offer for a fixed price Northwest Pipeline sumas index swap Thanks Enron sheetxls

FW Heartland Steel exposure at COB Jan Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Thursday September PM To Ortiz Lucy Subject FW Heartland Steel exposure at COB Jan Here you go Lucyit WAS Jason Williams Original Message From Vela Valerie Sent Wednesday August PM To Williams Jason R Credit Subject RE Heartland Steel exposure at COB Jan Jason There is a net receivable of about Do I remember you saying yesterday that your marktomarket exposure calculation is including the contract termination fee or not Chuck Jacobs was given this number It was included in the Jan invoice but HS did not pay it This fee was never entered in Sitara and Unify never generated an invoice for it So we wont see that as an outstanding receivable in SAP Does this number get included Please see my attachment and call if you need anything else One more issue there is approximately on sale side on the purchase side that we owe them for vol adjustments on MGT following Jan My thought is that this number should be included during negotiations on a final number Do you want backup pipe support showing this credit is in fact valid Thanks Valerie Original Message From Williams Jason R Credit Sent Tuesday July PM To Enerson John Vela Valerie Mellencamp Lisa Subject Heartland Steel exposure at COB Jan John Valerie and Lisa I have run the calculations on Heartland Steels marktomarket exposure as of close of business on January The figure I have calculated is Please note that this number does not represent the entire termination payment We also need to include the net payablereceivable as of COB to determine the complete termination payment I recall that we had a net receivable from Heartland but I do not recall the amount It should have been somewhere in the neighborhood of for December gas and for January gas to that point Valerie can you pull records to indicate what the receivable was on that date Please call me if you have any questions File Heartland Steel Termination Pmt COB xls

Contact Name for Sawnee and CowetaFayetteMy contact is Fred Ritts at Brickfield Bruchette Ritts Stone PC Just in case you need to talk to someone directly I will be out for just a little while please call me on my cell if you need me immediately Many thanks Lucy

Omnibus Option Template for Paper Deals Cc Sara Would you please look over this omnibus option template that I took from TAGG and modify it as you see fit for the Paper World Many thanks Lucy PS This particular deal is for a paper DRAFT but I thought we should have the template in place anyway For future deals of course
Weather Procedures Cc what Shari Tanya and I came up with in November of for Back Office and Trading Regards Lucy

Basic Weather Presentation WRMA InfoThis email has tons of info Weather Website Weather Presentation WRMA Info Weather Website wwwweatherriskcom Weather Presentation SECOND ANNUAL WRMA CONVENTION The second Annual Convention of WRMA will be held June in Southhampton Bermuda It is expected to be attended by representatives of over companies engaged in weather risk management The program will include informative seminars speakers and opportunities for networking On June th the program begins early with registration continental breakfast and enduser panel discussionsand more wwwwrmaorg RESERVATIONS Sonesta Beach Resort Bermuda Southampton Bermuda PO Box HM Hamilton HMEX Bermuda fax wwwsonestacom June singledouble triple occupancy quad occupancy Guestroom rates are subject to government taxes currently BLOCK IS WEATHER RISK MANAGEMENT ASSOCIATION HOTEL CUTOFF DEADLINE IS SLEEPING ROOMS ARE TO BE GUARANTEED BY A TWONIGHT DEPOSIT THE DEPOSIT IS NONREFUNDABLE IF THE RESERVATION IS CANCELED LESS THAN DAYS IN ADVANCE AND IN THE EVENT OF EARLY DEPARTURE

Christiana Bankwould like to know if this language is appropriate to put into a Deemed ISDA Initial Payment On or immediately after the Trade Date ECT shall prepare execute and send a Confirmation evidencing the terms of this Transaction to Counterparty for execution Upon receipt of the Confirmation by Counterparty Counterparty shall pay to ECT
Final Lumber Swap Draft Cc request
Bank of America Revised Cc made the indicated changes in green I think its easier to review that way Please let me know when it can go out Regards Lucy

New List for youis basically the same but I am taking over Melbas duties along with managing the Weather Desk documentation Forwarded by Lucy OrtizHOUECT on PM Joe Hunter x Sign confirmations for Nat Gas and Liquids Any additional questions not covered by individuals below LUCY ORTIZ x Weather Oneoff trades collars swaptions deemed ISDA etc Liason with origination group and liquids group Audit requests Angie Andrea Guillen x Generate RISKMANTRA confirmations Generate confirmations for counterparties without master agreements Counterparty requests Revised confirmations Pending credit issues Pam Conner Sonnier x Generate Canada financial Nat Gas and Liquids confirmations Pending sent to trader red folders Generate confirmations for counterparties with master agreements Willie Harrell x Unexecuted confirmations Stat reports Verify counterparty paper Liquid broker statements Miscellaneous incoming faxes from Counterparty
